The risks of having a pacemaker include infection, bleeding, and bruising at the site of insertion. But don't worry, the complications are rare.

If you have a pacemaker, you should avoid MRI scans unless your doctor determines it is safe. MRI machines generate strong magnetic fields that can interfere with the pacemaker function.
